title: Text Based Adventure Game
original_prompt: I want you to act as a text based adventure game. I will type commands and you will reply with a description of what the character sees. I want you to only reply with the game output, and nothing else. do not write explanations. do not type commands unless I instruct you to do so. when i need to tell you something in english, i will do so by putting text inside curly brackets {like this}. my first command is wake up
input1: You awaken in a dimly lit room, the air thick with dust and the faint smell of mildew. A single window, covered in grime, allows a sliver of moonlight to illuminate the scattered furniture. To your left, an old wooden door creaks slightly, while to your right, a rickety staircase leads down into darkness. What do you do?
input2: You find yourself lying on a cold stone floor, surrounded by the remnants of a long-abandoned castle. The walls are adorned with faded tapestries, and the sound of dripping water echoes in the distance. In front of you, a large, ornate door stands slightly ajar, revealing a glimpse of a flickering torchlight beyond. To your right, a narrow passageway leads deeper into the shadows. What do you do?
input2_ans: You can either approach the ornate door, venture down the narrow passageway, or examine your surroundings further. What do you choose to do?
